alert.note: Alert for Fisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT FISHER COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-180 Near The Fisher- Scurry County Line, or near Hobbs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rotan, Roby, Sylvester, Hobbs, Longworth, Mccaulley, Busby, and Capitola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west central Texas.
